channel.title: Now taking pitches for Codex - Ectoplasm 2
channel.description:
We are now taking pitches for Codex - Ectoplasm 2. We're looking for original, short-form games that are connected to the theme of "ectoplasm." You can interpret the theme however you wish, but ghosts and spookiness are a must. We pay .06 USD/word for Codex PLUS you retain ownership of your text.
Please send your short pitch (a single, short paragraph) directly to me at jason dot cordova at hey dot com.

item.title: Now taking pitches for Codex - Ectoplasm 2
item.dc:creator: @Deckard
item.description:
@Deckard wrote:

@jasoncordova… Just for clarity is this jason.cordova@hey.com? I have an early idea. Not quite organized into a pitch yet though.

Read full topic
item.source: Now taking pitches for Codex - Ectoplasm 2
